description: SAFETY ISN'T EXPENSIVE, IT'S PRICELESS! Pepper Spray Etc. Store's main product line is College Safety Bundles. These can be used for a single student or for students to save and share. Either way, they are a great value! They are carefully thought out and each one offers more than one form of personal protection. We research each product to make sure they are high quality. Then we put together bundles that make good safety sense to college students. We will not sell anything we wouldn't personally feel safe using. This process takes time, effort and careful thought. Last, but not least, we try our hardest to keep the price point affordable for our customers. Thanks for checking out our products!
